definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: turban of high priest;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 21:31, [[נׇ֑פֶת]] Ex 28:37, Ex 29:6; cstr. [[מִחְנֶ֫פֶת]] Le 16:4; —turban of linen Ex 28:4, Ex 28:37, Ex 28:37, Ex 28:39, Ex 29:6, Ex 29:6, Ex 39:28, Ex 39:31, Le 8:9, Le 8:9, Le 16:4; sign of royalty Ez Eze 21:31.
